SELECT ID AS id, APP_CODE AS appCode, `LEVEL` AS level, CLASS_NAME AS className, METHOD_NAME AS methodName, IP AS ip, ACCOUNT_ID AS accountId, REQUEST_NO AS requestNo, URL AS url, CREATE_TIMESTAMP AS createTimestamp from log_common_log where id <= ( #{gtValue} - #{pageSize} * (#{pageNo}-1) ) ORDER BY ID desc LIMIT 0, #{pageSize};
